comments: Sabonis (IND) has an arm placed against Adebayo (MIA), but the contact is marginal as he deflects the throw-in.
The ball is last touched by Adebayo (MIA) before going out of bounds and it should be Pacers' possession.
Adebayo (MIA) makes contact to Brissett's (IND) arm that affects his ability to follow through during the jump shot attempt.
Sabonis (IND) places an arm against Adebayo (MIA) with no extension and the contact during the rebound is marginal.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Brogdon (IND) throws the ball out of bounds.
Brogdon (IND) legally contests Herro's (MIA) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Butler (MIA) legally contests Brogdon's (IND) driving shot attempt and the contact is marginal.
Brissett (IND) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
Duarte (IND) has an arm placed on Robinson's (MIA) back and the contact does not affect his FOM.
Sabonis (IND) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact from Butler (MIA) during his driving shot attempt.
Brogdon (IND) blocks the shot attempt and is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Butler (MIA) gathers the ball and takes three steps before his jump shot attempt.
Sabonis (IND) makes incidental contact with Adebayo's (MIA) body as he gains control of the rebound.
The Pacers signal to call timeout and it is acknowledged by the official with 3.8 seconds remaining.
Herro (MIA) legally contests Duarte's (IND) jump shot attempt.
